website_summaries.verdict: If you want something out of the ordinary, try this triangle-shaped banneton from The Great Bake Co.
pros: 9-inch triangle-shaped banneton bowl, natural linen cloth liner and cover, plastic dough scraper, and instructions
Hand crafted from fine, natural rattan cane
Scraper is a great, helpful tool

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used yet
customer_reviews.text: Still have not used the Banton. The bread scraper works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Pope

customer_reviews.title: ... I learned how to set the bowl up I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Once I learned how to set the bowl up I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really Really small...the bread was hard to make in it
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set was great, used it right away for a sourdough bread.
customer_reviews.author: KDB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing I was looking for. Fast delivery, and a quality product. I have already used it for my first loaf of bread! This will last me for years.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worked a Great!
customer_reviews.text: I just made my first loaf of sourdough bread and used this proofing basket. The instructions were really clear on how to season it and the bread came out perfect. It had the nice lines made by the rattan basket. I didn't us the cloth, I just covered my dough with a kitchen towel.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kelly

customer_reviews.title: First Attempt Ever... Success!
customer_reviews.text: My first ever attempt at making naturally captured yeast leavened bread. Using this basket my attempt was a raging success! I followed the directions on how to season the basket and used the scraper to loosen the sides of the dough and it worked perfect. Just like on Youtube!
customer_reviews.author: Looking

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. Bread comes out looking really nice. I like how it comes with its own elastic tea towel cover to allow for good proofing. I am going to buy another shape for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Great way to let your dough rise and the scraper is great, stiff enough to scrape the side and cut the dough,but still flexible enough for use inside bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and received them within 2 days and used them this morning! The markings on my boule looked pretty cool, too.
customer_reviews.author: Spazzy

customer_reviews.title: Banneton Proofing Basket
customer_reviews.text: Have not had an opportunity to use the proofing basket. However, I did season it with floor which was not difficult. Once the sour dough starter is ready then I will giving the Proofing Basket a run for the money. I only wished the basket was in a larger size. I think it would be easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: jim lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely constructed banneton cane rattan proofing basket with a handy linen liner. The outside diameter is the advertised 8.5 inches. The interior diameter is 8 inches and is just under 3.5 inches tall. The plastic dough scrapper is a nice addition, though it won't replace either my silicone scraper spatula or my bench scraper when I make bread. ~I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.~
customer_reviews.author: ljn

customer_reviews.title: Great proofer
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter. She is always baking. She brought me over a loaf that she made using the bowl and it was beautiful and good to boot. This opinion is my own, based on my experience with this product. I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review. Just like Amazon Vine reviewers, I am not paid, nor am I obligated to leave a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Todd

product_meta.title: Banneton Proofing Basket Set (4 pieces) - Premium 9 Inch Triangle Bread Proofing Brotform, Dough Scraper, Linen Cloth Liner and Instructions by The Great Bake Co
product_meta.description:
Bake truly spectacular artisan loaves with this 4-piece proofing bundle from The Great Bake Co! 

Our mission is to help you create healthy homemade breads that are not only delicious to taste, but also a feast for the eyes! 

A LOAF FOR ALL OCCASIONS - Whether you're a sucker for sourdough or wild about white, you can create any type of bread in your banneton. It will hold 1kg (2.2lb) of dough, producing loaves big enough to feed a hungry family or a party of friends. 

PREMIUM MATERIALS - Our highest quality materials and craftsmanship ensure a great bake time after time. The banneton is hand crafted from naturally sourced rattan cane which works to draw moisture from your dough as it proves. The end result? A beautifully crusty loaf. Also included is a natural linen cloth which can be used to line the banneton for a smooth finish, or to cover whilst the dough is proving. 

GREAT FOR GIFTING - Your banneton bundle comes with full instructions printed on an easy-to-read reversible card, making an excellent gift for that budding baker in your life. 

EVERYTHING YOU NEED - Your 4 piece proofing bundle gives unbeatable value for money, providing you with everything you need to turn your ingredients into impressive creations. 

WHAT'S INCLUDED?

- 9" triangle banneton proofing basket, hand crafted from the finest natural rattan.

- Ergonomically designed dough scraper.

- Natural elasticated linen banneton liner and cover.

- Double-sided instruction card, packed full of proving and care hints and tips. 

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEE 

We are committed to providing you with the best quality products and are confident that you will love your Great Bake Co. 4 piece proofing set. However, if for any reason you are not satisfied, we will be happy to provide you with a full refund within 30 days, no questions asked.

Buy now with confidence!
feature_bullets: DELICIOUS ARTISAN BREAD - Perfect for rising all types of bread including sourdough and rye. Amaze your family and friends with delicious healthy patterned artisan bread which looks truly spectacular!

EVERYTHING YOU NEED - Ideal for the professional baker and beginner alike. Each bundle includes 9 inch triangle banneton bowl, natural linen cloth liner/cover, plastic dough scraper and top instructions - everything you need to get baking right away!
A GREAT BAKE EVERY TIME - Hand crafted from the finest natural rattan cane to ensure the best bake every time. All materials are fully EU/FDA compliant.
LOW MAINTENANCE - Easily cleaned and stored - simply follow the instructions included. Durable and built to last, your banneton will prove it's worth time and time again.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We love our products and think you will too. If for any reason you are not fully satisfied receive a full refund.
